name: Chakanantics v1.0
description:
Never seen Chakana played, and never actually thought about it myself, but considering there's been a predominance of NBN Fast Advance decks as of late (here in Italy, that is) I thought it might be worth using it.

Giving it a try in Anarch cause I was inspired by db0's Slowdown deck, but I chose to go with Noise since it's the identity of choice when handling large quantities of viruses.
Whizzard's recurring credits could help as well, but in this case it's better to force the Corp into protecting Archives as well, considering you have to aim for R&D here.

Surge is an obvious plus, giving you an immediate Chakana effect after just one run on R&D. If you manage to have The Source and a powered-up Chakana (or more than one), the Corp will be forced to flush the virus tokens. Just do it again, they can't purge them all the time.

name: NBN's Bizarre Adventure v2
description:
t's a combo deck with multiple win conditions available.
1\ SanSan : Strangely enough, the deck doesn't use trace ice. As soon as you have 8 credits and SanSan on table behind ETR ices, score profiteering for max profits. Rince and repeat for every agenda you get.

2\ Midseason/Beale/Psycho : Bad publicity will be of no use for the runner against trace events and this is why I chose Making News ID. Using money generators (Pop-up, Hedge Fund, GLC, Profiteering), the deck can quickly climb at 15-20 credits, making it possible to score a 4-5 AP Beale for victory.

3\ Midseason/SE/Archived Memories/PSF : Alternatively to scoring, SE/PSF can flatline the runner. Plascrete can nullify partially. If PSF is scored, focus on those and then SE the runner.

4\ Program destruction : Useful again noise and criminal. With Grim and Swordsman, the deck can create timing opportunities to score more agendas.

Additionnal Info : 1 Closed Accounts against tagme runners or after a bad Account Siphon. 1 Swodsman against Atman/Darwin/Crypsis. 45 Cards only to maximise probabilities.

name: Exile's ICE Destroyer Device
description:
Untested yet.

Focused on destroying ICE after anon asked for more examples of ICE destroying decks.

Strategies:
Test Run/Scavenge to install the programs. Modded for the Hardware. Dinosaurus to host Battering Ram or Femme Fatale.
Parasite/Datasucker to destroy ICE. Also Kraken and FAO.

Clone chip to re-use parasites.

Possible drawbacks: lack of MU and econ.

Possible modifications:
Instead of Parasite and datasucker, use rooks and crescentus to lock the ice from rezzing and then FAO it. This can also work to drain the corp's bank accounts, making it more likely to destroy the ice with FAO.
Might need Infiltration or Snitchs.

The deck might work better with Kate, but I opted for Exile because his ability will trigger with scavenge, test run and clone chip.
